articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects Defence Unit on Cho Islet
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects Defence Unit on Cho Islet
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, inspected the unit on Cho Islet defending a forward post on the west coast.
					 He gave a pair of binoculars and an automatic rifle to the unit as gifts and had a picture taken with its service personnel.
					
					 Watching the families of service personnel shouting "hurrah!" with excitement outside the barracks, he called them to his side.
					
					 He showed loving care and had a photo session with the families of service personnel, their eyes wet with tears of joy at having such a dream-like fortune.
					
					 He went round the room for the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to history.
					
					 Watching with keen attention the precious historical materials which bear witness to the leadership feats of leader Kim Jong Il, he looked back with deep emotion on the proud course covered by the defence unit on Cho Islet which has turned into an invulnerable fortress thanks to the devoted efforts of Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Saying that Cho Islet is a gate to the West Sea and Pyongyang is behind the islet, he instructed the service personnel of the defence unit to consolidate the combat positions as firm as a rock, always bearing deep in mind the instructions given by Kim Jong Il.
					
					 He walked the road on a steep hill and mounted a forward command post on top of a mountain.
					
					 After hearing a report on the situation from the commander of the defence unit, he feasted his eyes on the vast defence theatre of which the defence unit is in charge to acquaint himself with the terrain and the deployment of forces.
					
					 He asked in detail about forces and equipment of the enemy that may intrude into the operational theatre of which the defence unit is in charge, operational tactics, assignment of combat duties and the density of firing to beat back the enemy in the forward defence theatre. He examined an operational map with keen attention and lucidly clarified the issues arising in making preparations for battles.
					
					 He instructed the service personnel to step up combat preparations, always aware that their positions allow no retreat and there is no place to retreat even an inch there, and thus mercilessly wipe out the aggressors should they come in attack. 
					
					 He had a photo session with the service personnel of a company under the unit before the monument to the field guidance of Kim Jong Il standing at the forward command post.
					
					 He made the rounds of the service personnel's hall, library and mess hall to take deep care of the living of service personnel of the islet posts.
					
					 The service personnel of the defence unit are true patriots who have devoted their all to the security of the country and the people only though they live on the unfavorable remote islet, he said, stressing the need for the commanding officers to look after their living at all times with warm care as their real fathers would do.
					
					 At the end of the inspection, he told the commanding officers that he left Cho Islet to them and wished them greater achievements in rounding off the combat preparations in good health.
					
					 He was accompanied by KPA Vice Marshal Ri Yong Ho, chief of the  General Staff of the KPA, KPA Vice Marshal Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Generals Kim Won Hong, Pak Jae Gyong and Kim Yong Chol, KPA Col. Generals Jo Kyong Chol and Yun Tong Hyon, Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Navy Unit
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un Inspects KPA Navy Unit
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Supreme Commander of the Korean People's Army Kim Jong Un, supreme leader of the Workers' Party of Korea and the people of the DPRK, inspected KPA Navy Unit 123 honored with the title of O Jung Hup-led Seventh Regiment.
					 He got aboard Submarine Chaser No. 202 and headed for the unit despite rough waves. He learned about its arms and equipment and its seamen's combat preparedness.
					
					 He expressed great satisfaction over the fact that all officers and men of the ship have intensified their trainings to be fully prepared for actions and have been trained to be matchless combat ranks capable of firmly defending the territorial waters of the country. 
					
					 He made the rounds of the room dedicated to the education in the revolutionary history and the room devoted to the history of the unit.
					
					 Watching historical materials on the peerlessly great men of Mt. Paektu displayed in the room for the education in the revolutionary history one by one with great attention, he said the undying feats of President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il who worked heart and soul for the strengthening and development of the naval force would go down in the history of the country forever.
					
					 He looked back on the shining course of battles covered by the unit under the care of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il.
					
					 Noting that the ideological and moral state of the seamen of the KPA is very good as proven by the history of battles in the West Sea that stunned the world, he said they are priceless treasures of the Party and revolution who unhesitatingly sacrifice even their youth and lives to protecting the country and the people.
					
					 He made the rounds of soldiers' hall, library, health complex, storehouse for non-staple food, food processing site and other places to acquaint himself in detail with the political and ideological education of seamen and their service.
					
					 After asking about the use of soldiers' hall, he instructed the officials accompanying him to make the naval unit there the first leg of the performance tour of army units by the State Merited Chorus.
					
					 At the library, he asked in detail about how many books the library can house, if it received must books in good time and if there was a good habit of reading among seamen, underscoring the need to always pay primary attention to the ideological education.
					
					 He again asked about bean farming in which he always shows interest on his way to inspect the front and also asked if bean was supplied to seamen regularly. He met with cooks and told them to do their best for seamen.
					
					 He posed for a picture with the service personnel of the unit. 
					
					 He waved back to the seamen overcome with emotion and came out to a naval port for departure. He went round Hero Chae Jong Bo Warship moored at the port.
					
					 He stood in the steering house of the ship for a long while despite strong wind and waved to its seamen.
					
					  Upon arrival at the port, he had a photo session with the seamen of Submarine Chaser No. 202. 
					
					 He was accompanied by Vice Marshal of the KPA Ri Yong Ho, chief of the General Staff of the KPA, Vice Marshal of the KPA Kim Yong Chun, minister of the People's Armed Forces, KPA Generals Kim Won Hong, Pak Jae Gyong and Kim Yong Chol and KPA Colonel Generals Jo Kyong Chol and Yun Tong Hyon.
					
					 He was also accompanied by Jang Song Thaek, alternate member of the Political Bureau of the C.C., the WPK and vice-chairman of the National Defence Commission, Pak To Chun, alternate member of the Political Bureau and secretary of the C.C., the WPK, Ri Jae Il, first vice department director of the C.C., the WPK, and Hwang Pyong So, vice department director of the C.C., the WPK.

articles.title: Lee Myung Bak of Traitors Accused of Challenging DPRK
articles.content:
Lee Myung Bak of Traitors Accused of Challenging DPRK
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A spokesman for the Committee for the Peaceful Reunification of Korea issued a statement on Friday as the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is now taking more challenging attitude, far from apologizing with its knees on the ground for its thrice-cursed provocation against the enraged army and people of the DPRK.
					 The statement said:
					
					 On March 5 the group of traitors let a spokesman for the puppet Defense Ministry to claim that "there is no worth responding to every unreasonable assertion of the north", "signs at the unit in Inchon were to help soldiers establish the outlook on enemy" and "the south is in a position to urge the north to halt slandering."
					
					 Those from the puppet Ministry of Unification have made lame excuses to evade the responsibility for the high treason, asserting that it is "internal affairs of the forces" and "it is a basic moral obligation for the north to immediately stop slandering the south first".
					
					 What should not be overlooked is that hooligans of the puppet military have been getting frantic claiming that "they would not remove the photos hung on walls and doors of the unit and defamatory words below them" and "they would stage military exercises as scheduled regardless of the far-fetched assertions of the north".
					
					 Puppet Defense Minister Kim Kwan Jin, chief culprit of the hideous provocation, appeared on Yonphyong Island where he said that the "north is sure to provoke". This guy also called for "resolutely and powerfully punishing to take revenge for the sinking of 'Cheonan' warship and the Yonphyong Island shelling".
					
					 This hideous challenge has touched off the resentment of all the servicepersons and people of the DPRK who have turned out vowing to stage the sacred war of retaliation and justice. This is a reckless confrontation kicked up by the foolish group of traitors, unaware of genuine arms of the strong revolutionary army of Mt. Paektu and real war.
					
					 The group of traitors is talking about "retaliation" and "punishment", while refusing to take down the signs hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. This is nothing but a declaration to make showdown with the DPRK to the last.
					
					 This clearly shows once again that the group of traitors is, indeed, worst clique of gangsters and that the nation can not be in peace even for a single day nor can the Korean Peninsula be free from the danger of a war as long as such guys are allowed to breathe air in this land.
					
					 No words will work on the group of traitors which is set to turn the confrontation with fellow countrymen into a sea of blood and flames.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will surely achieve national reunification by giving full play to their will to mercilessly wipe out the group, now that it openly provokes the DPRK.
					
					 This is a final resolution of the army and people of the DPRK.

articles.title: Servicepersons Vow to Wipe Out S. Korean Traitors
articles.content:
Servicepersons Vow to Wipe Out S. Korean Traitors
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Meetings took place in North Hwanghae and Ryanggang Provinces on Friday at which servicepersons and people vowed to wipe out through a merciless sacred war the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army was read out to be followed by speeches.
					
					 The speakers branded the Lee group of traitors as human scum worse than rabid dogs, hordes of traitors bereft of elementary ethics and morality.
					
					 They called for uninterruptedly staging the DPRK-style sacred war in an indiscriminate and intensive way till the Lee group of traitors makes an apology for its high treason before the nation.
					
					 The DPRK has the most powerful and merciless striking means and methods which are unknown to the world and beyond human imagination. Such human scum as the group of traitors can never get out of the range of the heavy strikes of its revolutionary armed forces, they said, went on:
					
					 The revolutionary armed forces of Mt. Paektu will shower fire deadlier than what was done on Yonphyong Island and thus blow up not only the dens of such human scum but Chongwadae and other bulwarks of the group of traitors so that they may not hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK and defame its inviolable system any longer.
					
					 The speakers underscored the need to firmly protect Korean style socialism, the supreme dignity and life of the DPRK, united close around the headquarters of the revolution, bearing deep in mind the unshakable conviction that the DPRK is sure to triumph under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un. 
					
					 Present at the meetings were officials of local party and power bodies and working people's organizations, servicepersons of the KPA and Korean People's Internal Security Forces, people of various circles and youths and students. 
					
					 The meetings were followed by protest demonstrations.

articles.title: Resentment at S. Korea Grows Stronger among DPRK People
articles.content:
Resentment at S. Korea Grows Stronger among DPRK People
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- People from all walks of life in the DPRK are now renewing their resolution to wipe out the south Korean group of traitors at a time when such outbursts as the "north's intention to spark conflict in south Korea" and "its strategy for engaging the U.S. and blocking south Korea" are heard from the traitor Lee Myung Bak regime.
					 Ri Kwang Song, officer of the Korean People's Army, told KCNA in an angry note:
					
					 "Traitor Lee Myung Bak is talking nonsense at a time when the hearts of all the servicepersons and people are burning with the towering resentment at his regime which committed such high treason as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We can never pardon the fool as he, ambiguous in nationality, shook his fist towards the Heaven. 
					
					 We, service personnel of the KPA, will discharge their mission to mete out a stern punishment to the group of traitors.
					
					 You, group of traitors, don't think you can escape from the strike of our arms."
					
					 Kim Nyon Sil, a woman living in Jungsong-dong, Central District, Pyongyang, said the Lee group of traitors is too ignorant of the DPRK. She continued:
					
					 "It is our service personnel and people who are ready to throw themselves into water and fire and unhesitatingly dedicate even their lives to protecting portraits of the peerlessly great men.
					
					 How can we pardon those villains who impaired the authority of the great men of Mt. Paektu to whom all the Koreans look up as the sun.
					
					 We should beat the group of traitors to death by the concerted efforts of the nation as it is talking rubbish even after committing the thrice-cursed crimes." 
					
					 Kang Myong Il, a student of Pyongyang University of Construction and Building-Materials Industry, had this to say: 
					
					 "The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is going reckless, unaware of what hideous crimes it has committed against the nation.
					
					 It is none other than the Lee Myung Bak group, political imbeciles and underwits unable to calculate what consequences their reckless acts will bring.
					
					 Only when this group is wiped out to the last man, is it possible to put an end to the tragedy of national split and bring earlier national reunification.
					
					 The Lee group should clearly know that all the enraged servicepersons and people's war of retaliation will be waged any time and any place.
					
					 The army and people of the DPRK will find out the group of traitors without fail anywhere in this land and sky and mercilessly cut off their windpipes."

articles.title: KPISF Unit Holds Live-fire Exercise
articles.content:
KPISF Unit Holds Live-fire Exercise
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- A unit of the Korean People's Internal Security Forces, belonging to Kim Chol, holds a live-fire exercise targeting the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, who insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea.
					 Immediately after an initiate order, soldiers began firing shoulder-fired anti-tank weapons and machine guns, reducing a simulated enemy's position to pieces.
					
					 They are shouting: 
					
					 "Let us reduce Kae (dog) Myung Bak to ashes."
					
					 "Let us destroy south Korean military warmongers."
					
					 A general officer, Kim Kuk Ryong, told KCNA:
					
					 "Our anger at the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is running high.
					
					 The group dared defame the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership. The hideous provocation reminds us of a puppy knowing no fear of a tiger.
					
					 We can never tolerate it. We, men and officers of the KPISF, will surely take revenge upon Lee."
					
					 A general officer, Kim Jong Ho, said:
					
					 "Once an order is given by Supreme Commander Kim Jong Un, we will make a clean sweep of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors, who committed an indelible high treason. The world will witness how they will meet a miserable end."
					
					 An officer, Ko Yong Ho, said:
					
					 "Disgusting faces of Lee Myung Bak, Kim Kwan Jin and Jong Sung Jo, headquartered in Seoul, are now looming before my eyes. On every account, I will take vengeance upon them."
					
					 A sergeant, Paek Kum Sam, said:
					
					 "We are fully determined to destroy the mad dogs. Once an order is given for southward advance, we will destroy the traitors to the last man."

articles.title: Koreans Increase Production in Full Combat Readiness
articles.content:
Koreans Increase Production in Full Combat Readiness
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The working people of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea are increasing production in full combat readiness to turn out in the sacred war for wiping out the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors.
					 Various sectors of the national economy are effecting fresh innovation in the production and construction.
					
					 The February 8 Vinalon Complex made a breakthrough to holding a trial operation of airtight carbide furnace more than ten days ahead of schedule, while the Tongbong Co-op Farm of Hamju County, South Hamgyong Province transported 140-odd tons of manure to fields overnight.
					
					 The Kowon Coal Mine more than doubled the production.
					
					 The miners of the Jaeryong and Unryul coal mines of South Hwanghae Province have fulfilled their daily iron ore production plans over 150 percent.    Industrial establishments and co-op farms of the province are making great innovation in the production of consumer goods and in farm preparation.
					
					 The dike construction is being pressed ahead at the Ryongmaedo tideland reclamation site.   
					
					 The Hwanghae Iron and Steel Complex is spurring the drive to put the production of heavy rails on a normal basis. 
					
					 The coal mines of South Phyongan Province are over-fulfilling their daily tunneling assignments.

articles.title: DPRK Will  Abide by Its Supreme Principle: KCNA Commentary
articles.content:
DPRK Will  Abide by Its Supreme Principle: KCNA Commentary
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The tensest situation is now prevailing on the Korean Peninsula.
					 The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors committed such hideous crimes as hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with staging war maneuvers in collusion with outside forces during the nation's mourning period. This is touching off the towering resentment of the army and the people of the DPRK.
					
					 The acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are the height of confrontation with compatriots and the worst provocation.
					
					 This is because they consider what the group of traitors did as the most hideous provocations which can never be pardoned in this land and sky
					
					 Thrown into the dumping ground of history for its sycophancy towards the U.S. and treachery, misrule enforced against the people and irregularities and corruption, the Lee group found a way for prolonging its remaining days in escalating the confrontation with compatriots and stepping up the war moves.
					
					 The Lee group is getting frantic with war moves against the north, while perpetrating the above-said provocations.
					
					 The south Korean warmongers staged Cobra Gold, the largest in the Asia-Pacific region, together with troops of the U.S. and Japan.  On March 4 air forces of the U.S. and the south Korea conducted an unprecedented sortie drill for a preemptive strike at the DPRK in the U.S. air force base in Kunsan. At least 60 fighters armed with various type missiles, bombs and other weaponry were busy with the above-said drills in the runways.
					
					 It is due to the zealous prodding of the U.S. that the puppet group is making such desperate efforts to deter the climate of dialogue from being created when DPRK-U.S. talks showed a sign of progress recently.
					
					 In case the U.S. keeps encouraging the Lee group in its reckless acts, failing to properly understand the gravity of the situation, no one will be able to evade the ensuing consequences. 
					
					 To protect the leader unto death is the supreme principle of the DPRK that remains unchanged no matter how frequently the world may change.
					
					 This principle allows neither bargain nor slightest compromise.
					
					 It is the unwavering will of the DPRK to react to any act of hurting the dignity of its supreme leadership through a merciless sacred war.

articles.title: S. Korea's Insult to Supreme Leader of DPRK Is Provocation
articles.content:
S. Korea's Insult to Supreme Leader of DPRK Is Provocation
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The insult of south Korea's Lee Myung Bak group of traitors to the dignity of the supreme leadership of the Democratic People's Republic of Korea is tantamount to a declaration of war.
					 Such an insult is part of the provocations they have committed from long ago.
					
					 They include the case of "targeting the DPRK flag" at units of the three services of the puppet forces, slogans and billboards defaming the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership, that were hung at barracks, military posts and facilities and the case of "targeting the dignity of the DPRK supreme leadership" in firing ranges and drill grounds.
					
					 Besides, when the DPRK was stricken with grief over the demise of leader Kim Jong Il last year, they clamped "an emergency alert" on the military, creating a war-like atmosphere across south Korea.
					
					 They also scattered leaflets slandering the DPRK from areas along the Military Demarcation Line.
					
					 Merciless punishment only awaits the confrontational maniacs.
					
					 It is evident that the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors will surely meet a miserable end.

articles.title: Truth of Sacred War of Korean Style Can Never Be Downplayed
articles.content:
Truth of Sacred War of Korean Style Can Never Be Downplayed
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors is going so foolish in a bid to cover up the essence of its crimes and mislead public opinion at a time when all-people resistance is raging across the country. 
					 They are describing the above-said sacred war as "a campaign for solidifying the north's system", "a campaign for scuttling general election" and "tactics for engaging the U.S. and blocking the south". 
					
					 This is nothing but the group's hysteria against the nation and for escalated confrontation as it cries out for confrontation with compatriots till it breathes its last because of its inveterate hostility. This is a mean behavior reminding one of a thief crying "Stop the thief!"
					
					 The Lee group's balderdash about "campaign for solidifying the north's system" is no more than sheer sophism. 
					
					 The steel-strong unity of the society where the people are united close around the leader who carved out the destiny of the country and the nation for the first time in history is being successfully carried forward by the people's leader, great heir to his cause, and the younger generation loyal to him. 
					
					 The world people witness the strongest unity of Korean-style socialism and its invincible might in the great unity of the society in the DPRK and great succession. 
					
					 This is clearly proved by the unshakable determination of all the service personnel and people to wipe out to the last one the Lee group that hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK. 
					
					 The Lee group describing the political and ideological power as "a campaign for solidifying the north's system" is no more than idiots and the worst maniacs for confrontation with fellow countrymen. 
					
					 Lee Myung Bak is a political prostitute who has prolonged his dirty life through his perfidy and betrayal, bereft of any clear political creed or theory and a political orphan having no social foundation. 
					
					 Maybe, Lee needs the consolidation of his system as he finds himself in the worst crisis of system and political isolation. But it is too late. 
					
					 If riffraffs who had kept themselves alive under the patronage of Lee part with him, he will find no one who would sympathize with him even a bit, to say nothing of the system on which he may depend in the south Korean society. 
					
					 Lee finds even his way to his grave thorny as his name sounds. He is fated to be beaten to death like a rabid dog in any lane of south Korea or foreign land any moment.
					
					 The same can be said of "the campaign for scuttling the general election." 
					
					 Whether south Korea holds a "general election" or "presidential election," that is its internal affair, to all intents and purposes. 
					
					 At present Koreans see only the despicable plight of the Lee group more dead than alive as it is on the way to its graves, denied any chance to run for those elections. 
					
					 As south Korean people of different social standings comment, it is none other than the Lee group that is trying hard to exploit the situation for the purpose of the "general election." 
					
					 Lee is seriously mistaken if he thinks he can delay his doomsday by rallying the remnants of "pragmatism-oriented regime" and use it even a bit for securing his shelter after his dethronement. 
					
					 Lee's jargon about "tactics for engaging the U.S. and blocking the south" deserves derision. 
					
					 As regards the above-said tactics, one should question Lee if he truly hopes for the north's engaging the south and blocking the U.S. In other words, does he really want reconciliation and unity with fellow countrymen and restriction of foreign interference and guard against it? 
					
					 The group of traitors is not in a position to properly answer this simple question. 
					
					 For the puppet regime which acts according to the gesture or eyewink of its master, the above-said question may be a crucial one related to its rise or fall. But the DPRK may engage or block the U.S. anytime if it is in the interests of the country and the nation. 
					
					 As already clarified internally and externally, attaching importance to the nation is the consistent stand and steadfast principle of the DPRK in dealing with the issues related to the common interests of the nation. 
					
					 Precisely for this reason, the DPRK proposed dialogue when the Lee group was hell-bent on the preparations for a new war, talking about "military supremacy," backed by outside forces in the early period of its office, and made an offer for dialogue when it trumpeted about "sincerity". 
					
					 The DPRK's option for bilateral talks or multilateral talks is aimed at finally removing the threat of a nuclear war from the Korean Peninsula and handing over the nuclear-free new society to the Korean nation and posterity. 
					
					 Unconditional sycophancy toward outside forces and humiliating alliance with them is the "state policy" pursued by Lee in the whole period of his rule. 
					
					 It is none other than the Lee group which has pursued unlimited sycophancy towards outsiders with a "waiting strategy" aiming at "change and collapse" of the system of fellow countrymen. 
					
					 It is ridiculous for Lee to talk about "north's engaging the U.S. and blocking the south" as he has rejected the repeated sincere gesture and generosity of fellow countrymen but kowtowed to its master, licking his shoes. 
					
					 In this sense, it was Lee himself who pushed the DPRK to dialogue with the U.S.
					
					 If the DPRK's dialogue with the U.S., the party directly responsible for the denuclearization of the Korean Peninsula, means engaging the U.S., what should be said about the Lee group's such political prostitution as leaving everything in south Korea at the disposal of its master U.S. after its seizure of power. It is the most appropriate to call Lee worst pro-U.S. lackey and traitor.
					
					  "Much effort" and the like touted by Lee in a bid to mislead public opinion is nothing but a poor trick to show his complaint for being sidelined by his master and throw a hurdle in the way of the DPRK-U.S. talks.
					
					 This is no more than grievance shown by the stooge behind the scene after being ignored and forsaken by his master while pursuing the tactics of engaging the U.S. and blocking the north. 
					
					 Miserable, indeed, is the plight of Lee seized with fear that he may meet the same end as what Syngman Rhee or a  military dictator did while criticizing his master.
					
					 This reminds one of a rabid dog biting passers-by. 
					
					 All facts go to clearly prove that what Lee uttered is peppered with lies, deception, plots and trickery.
					
					 The Lee group calculated it could serve the treble purpose through the above-said provocations. It, however, finds itself in such miserable position that it deserves several thousands-fold punishment for all its crimes.
					
					 The maniacs who had gone against the June 15 joint declaration are rushing headlong into campaigns against reconciliation and unity and the people's will.
					
					 The group of criminals who failed to come to any human reason and show even a shred of conscience and resurrection can never evade the blame for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the dignity common to the nation.
					
					 One may jump from a sinking boat, but traitor Lee is destined to die while staying on the derailed train or jumping from it. 
					
					There is no other way for Lee but to be responsible for his fate.

articles.title: Unhasu Orchestra of DPRK Leaves for France
articles.content:
Unhasu Orchestra of DPRK Leaves for France
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Unhasu Orchestra led by Kwon Hyok Bong, advisor to the Korean Traditional Music Institute, Friday left here for France to co-perform with Radio Philharmonic Orchestra of France.
					 Kim Ki Nam, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, An Tong Chun, minister of Culture, and officials concerned saw it off at the airport.

articles.title: Posters Produced in Run-up to Conference of WPK
articles.content:
Posters Produced in Run-up to Conference of WPK
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Posters were produced in the run-up to the historic Conference of the Workers' Party of Korea.
					 A poster "The highest glory to our mother party!" reflects the Korean people's warm praise of the party founded by President Kim Il Sung and developed by leader Kim Jong Il into a powerful guiding force. 
					
					 It also represents their firm pledge to defend the Central Committee of the WPK headed by the dear respected Kim Jong Un with the unshakable conviction that Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il will always be with them.
					
					 A poster "Let us greet the Conference of the WPK with high political enthusiasm and brilliant labor successes!" depicts servicepersons, workers, farmers and intellectuals safeguarding the socialist country as firm as an iron wall and working miracles in the drive to build an economic power and improve the people's standard of living after turning out in the grandiose march in the new century of Juche.
					
					 There is a poster "Let us build waterway in South Hwanghae Province as a monumental structure in era of Songun!"

articles.title: Int'l Seminar on Forest and Landscape Restoration Held
articles.content:
Int'l Seminar on Forest and Landscape Restoration Held
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The International Seminar on Forest and Landscape Restoration was held at the People's Palace of Culture from Wednesday to Friday under the co-sponsorship of the Pyongyang International New Technological and Economic Information Centre (PINTEIC) and Environmental Education Media Project (EEMP).
					 Present there were delegates from China, Netherlands, Denmark, Germany, the U.S., UK and Canada and the executive director of the EEMP.
					
					 Also present there were officials of the Ministry of Land and Environmental Conservation, the State Academy of Sciences, the State Science and Technology Commission, the Academy of Agricultural Science, the C.C., the Nature Conservation Union of Korea, Kim Il Sung University, the Central Botanical Garden and other units and scientists, researchers and technicians. 
					
					 Ri Song Uk, vice-president of the State Academy of Sciences who is director of the PINTEIC, made an opening address which was followed by a congratulatory speech of Kosima Weber Liu, executive director of the EEMP.
					
					 They expressed belief that this international seminar would contribute to the worldwide efforts to protect and develop environment, valuable asset of mankind.
					
					 Its participants heard speeches made by famous scientists of the DPRK and various other countries.
					
					 The speakers explained the DPRK's policy of protecting forests, ecological system service and management for the well-being of humankind, theory and practice for improving rivers and streams, objects to be protected to restore forests in temperate forests, technology on forest and landscape restoration and other academic matters.
					
					 Its participants watched a video related to environment. 
					
					 A letter of thanks to the dear respected Kim Jong Un addressed by foreign delegates was adopted at the seminar.
					
					 The letter said:
					
					 We were deeply impressed to learn of Your Excellency's March 2 tree planting, which emphasized the importance of individual initiative in the task of national reforestation.
					
					 The seminar was indeed an excellent opportunity for foreign and DPRK experts to share experiences regarding multiple aspects of the science and technology of forest and landscape restoration.
					
					 We sincerely wish you good health and great success in your noble work of leading the Korean people in their striving to build a prosperous and sustainably developed country.
					
					 The seminar offered scientists of various countries a meaningful occasion of exchanging beneficial views on matters arising in protecting environment and acquiring practical experience and knowledge.

articles.title: National Fine Arts Exhibition Opens
articles.content:
National Fine Arts Exhibition Opens
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- An exhibition of fine arts pieces presented by amateur artists opened in Pyongyang as part of the National Art Festival for Commemorating the Centenary of Birth of President Kim Il Sung. 
					 On display there are more than 100 pieces. 
					
					 Seen in the center of the exhibition hall is the poster "May my great country prosper forever!" depicting the mindset of all the people that Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il are always with them. 
					
					 Also displayed there were Korean painting "Immortal Kimilsungia and Kimjongilia", oil painting "With Best Wish for Immortality", calligraphy "Immortality", woodwork "Eternal Sun", woodcut print "Even Sky and Land Grieve", watercolor painting "Blessed Vinalon City", Mannyon painting "Forest" and other paintings of diverse themes.
					
					 The paintings vividly reflect the firm will of the army and the people of the DPRK to hold President Kim Il Sung and leader Kim Jong Il in high esteem as the Songun sun of Juche for ever, and build a thriving socialist nation on this land under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.
					
					 The opening ceremony took place at the Pyongyang International Cultural Centre on Friday. 
					
					 Among the attendants were Choe Ryong Hae, secretary of the Central Committee of the Workers' Party of Korea, officials concerned, artists and amateurs.

articles.title: Remains of Hero of Republic Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
articles.content:
Remains of Hero of Republic Buried in Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Remains of Hero of the DPRK Ri Chang Son, who was head of the 4th sub-workteam of the 9th workteam of the Ohyon Co-op Farm in Yonan County, South Hwanghae Province of the DPRK, were buried in the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery. 
					 He breathed his last after saving three revolutionary comrades of his sub-workteam at a critical moment when a huge mass of frozen earth was falling down while making preparations for farming. 
					
					 The dear respected Kim Jong Un sent an autograph, making Ri's noble self-sacrificing spirit and heroic end of his life shine forever. 
					
					 A ceremony of burying his remains took place at the Patriotic Martyrs Cemetery on Friday. 
					
					 Present there were officials concerned, officials and farmers of the Ohyon Co-op Farm, bereaved families and relatives of Ri. 
					
					 A speech was made before the burial. 
					
					 His bereaved families and relatives and farmers laid a wreath and bouquets before his grave and paid silent tribute to him.

articles.title: DPRK Men's Soccer Team Beats Philippine Team 2:0
articles.content:
PRK Men's Soccer Team Beats Philippine Team 2:0
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The DPRK men's soccer team beat its Philippine rival 2:0 in a Friday match at the 2012 AFC Challenger Cup Tournament in Nepal.
					 The tournament, which brought together 8 teams, will continue till March 19, divided into two groups
					
					 The DPRK team will have the second match with the Tajik team on March 11.

articles.title: Marble Sculpture "Galloping Horse"
articles.content:
Marble Sculpture "Galloping Horse"
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Marble sculpture "Galloping Horse" on display at the International Friendship Exhibition House is a gift presented to President Kim Il Sung by the Chinese government during his visit to China in Juche 47 (1958).
					 Senior Chinese officials who respected the President as a great leader of the working class in the world and lodestar for the DPRK-China friendship provided the gift reflecting their absolute trust and profound reverence for him. 
					
					 Clouds under the hooves of the horse represent the shining achievements made by the Korean people in the revolution and construction.
					
					 The gift carries the sincerity of the Chinese government and people praising the President for initiating the Chollima movement and wisely leading the socialist revolution to victory to bring about leaping progress and miracle.

articles.title: Rodong Sinmun Discloses Criminal Nature of Foal Eagle Military Drills
articles.content:
Rodong Sinmun Discloses Criminal Nature of Foal Eagle Military Drills
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Foal Eagle joint military drills are a provocation against the north aimed to harass the peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula and invade Korea from A to Z. So, its criminal nature can never be covered up, Rodong Sinmun Friday says in a bylined article.
					 The inter-Korean relations have reached the worst phase and the situation on the Peninsula has inched close to the war phase due to the DPRK-targeted Foal Eagle joint military drills, the large-scale field mobile exercises kicked off by the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers from March 1, the article says, and goes on:
					
					  The military drills are the product of the U.S. aggression policy toward the north and the south Korean rulers' ambition for invasion of the north. This dangerous war rehearsal has been regularly staged and systematically escalated being fraught with the spark of a nuclear war.
					
					 Foal Eagle joint military drills were kicked off, pursuant to the OPLAN 5027, the scenario for an all-out war against the north, and the OPLAN 5029 allegedly to cope with "contingency".
					
					 OPLAN 5027 is a three-dimensional nuclear attack operation against the north consisting of five stages -- the phase of deterrence, the phase of neutralization, the phase of ground attack, the phase of expanding war successes and the phase of realizing unification under the system of liberal democracy.
					
					 OPLAN 5029, which divides the "contingency" into six kinds, basically aims to intentionally create a war phase on the Peninsula and spark military conflict to cope with it. 
					
					 All facts clearly prove that Foal Eagle joint military drills are a provocative and dangerous saber-rattling against the north.
					
					 This shows what a phase the U.S. and the south Korean warmongers' war hysteria aimed to invade the north has reached as it is an open declaration of a war against the DPRK.

articles.title: US Doomed to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
US Doomed to Ruin: Rodong Sinmun
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Bygone are the days when the U.S. used to show off its "strength" at UN, and the era of the only "superpower" is ending, said Rodong Sinmun on Friday in a bylined article.
					 It can be proven by the high-handed and arbitrary practices of the U.S. which are no longer working on the arena of international politics, it said, and added:
					
					 The U.S. is being increasingly shunned on UN arena. The situation turns bad for the U.S. as it has to stand trial for human rights abuses.
					
					 The U.S. economy started to decline.
					
					 The present financial crisis is an inevitable product of its unreasonable economic policy which turned it into the biggest debtor country.
					
					 It has so far massively produced and deployed new type weapons by spending colossal funds to realize its world domination strategy. It has spent huge funds for developing and producing latest nuclear weapons, in particular.
					
					 This weighed down on the U.S., burdening it with the systematic increase of heavy war expenditure and making its budget debt snowball.
					
					 The U.S. dollar dominant system is getting weakened in the international financial world.
					
					 It is also losing military supremacy in the world.
					
					 The U.S. is fighting an unsuccessful "war on terrorism" claiming huge casualties even though it mobilized huge forces boasting of the world's "strongest" as well as all types of mass destruction weapons into which up-to-date scientific and technical achievements have been introduced.
					
					 As proved, the U.S. lived out its days and only downfall awaits it.
					
					 The imperialists led by the U.S. are making desperate efforts to prolong their life but in vain.
					
					 The U.S. is bound to be ruined.

articles.title: Minju Joson Terms S. Korea's "Nuclear Security Summit" Hypocrisy
articles.content:
Minju Joson Terms S. Korea's "Nuclear Security Summit" Hypocrisy
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Lee Myung Bak group of traitors plans to host the "nuclear security summit" in Seoul in late March.
					 It is a burlesque to serve its sordid purpose to escalate the nuclear racket against the DPRK in alignment with the U.S.
					
					 Minju Joson Friday says this in a bylined commentary.
					
					 Madcap Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises are now under way across south Korea, the commentary notes, and goes on:
					
					 South Korea is the biggest nuclear arsenal and nuclear war magazine in the world which is blamed on the nuclear policy of the U.S. and anti-DPRK war moves of the south Korean group of traitors following it.
					
					 It is the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors which has so far made desperate efforts to hamper a solution to the nuclear issue on the Korean Peninsula.
					
					 The nuclear issue on the peninsula cropped up as the U.S. posed threat to the DPRK by waging nuclear war drills together with the puppet warmongers after shipping nuclear weapons to south Korea. So, the nuclear war threat should be removed first, if the nuclear issue of the peninsula is to be solved. Without it, peace and security on the peninsula can not be provided and the nuclear security talks will be nothing but an empty talk.
					
					 Lurking behind the upcoming Seoul summit the Lee group is going to host together with the U.S. is its sordid intention. It seeks to justify its nuclear racket against the DPRK and, at the same time, turn the atmosphere ahead of the parliamentary election in favor of it.
					
					 The south Korean people of various circles are now becoming increasingly active in opposing the summit and calling for judging the treacherous regime.
					
					 The desperate moves of the group of traitors will accelerate its ruin. The Lee group is fated to meet ruin.

articles.title: North-targeted War Drill May Lead to All-out War, Warns South Korean
articles.content:
North-targeted War Drill May Lead to All-out War, Warns South Korean
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Thongil News, Internet newspaper of south Korea, Tuesday carried an article "Exercises for a war against the north may lead to an all-out war" contributed by Kwon O Hon, honorary chairman of the Association for Supporting Prisoners of Conscience of the Family Movement for Realizing Democracy.
					 The article said that large-scale Key Resolve and Foal Eagle joint military exercises have been under way since Feb. 27 with hundreds of thousands of troops involved at a time when ceaseless drills for a war against the DPRK are going on in collusion with the U.S.
					
					 War-like forces are making oft-repeated excuses that the ongoing war drills are "defensive and annual ones" but they are the ones for preemptive nuclear attack and a war against the DPRK as follow-ups of Team Spirit in the light of their nature, purposes, scale and types of hardware involved, the article noted, adding:
					
					 To insist that the joint military exercises pursuant to OPLAN 5027 and OPLAN 5029 are defensive ones is as shameless an act as trying to eclipse the sun with a palm.
					
					 The saber-rattling that may lead to an all-out war is an action of disturbing peace and stability as it is a product of the U.S. military presence in south Korea and its hostile policy toward the DPRK and the south Korean authorities' cooperation with the U.S.
					
					 The article urged the south Korean and U.S. authorities to stop military actions for stifling the DPRK but withdraw the U.S. forces from south Korea.

articles.title: S. Korea's Confrontational Policy towards Compatriots Criticized
articles.content:
S. Korea's Confrontational Policy towards Compatriots Criticized
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The Association for National Reunification of the Citizens Federation for Economic Justice of south Korea on March 6 condemned the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors for escalating confrontation with compatriots.
					 The association said:
					
					 The south-north relations faced an uncontrollable phase due to the "government" policy of serving the U.S. against compatriots.
					
					 The "government" has insisted on such a confrontation-oriented policy of "No-nukes, opening, 3 000 dollars" during the past 4 years after taking power, thus giving rise to "Choenan warship" sinking case and Yonphyong shelling case.
					
					 Blaming the present "government" for the troubled peace and stability on the Korean Peninsula, the organization criticized it for clinging to the confrontational policy while talking about "the north's collapse".

articles.title: S. Korean Media Launches All-out Strike
articles.content:
S. Korean Media Launch All-out Strike
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The KBS branch of the south Korean media trade union, the MBC trade union and the YTN trade union simultaneously launched strikes on March 6 opposing the south Korean authorities which seek to put the media under their control.
					 A relevant meeting was held outside the KBS building.
					
					 The participants said the south Korean authorities' moves to put the media under their control amount to a severe abuse against the people's right to know.
					
					 They would wage unflinching actions to ensure the freedom of media and make the radio serve the people, they said.
					
					 They underscored the need to surely judge the group of traitors including Kim In Gyu, director of the KBS, through their actions.

articles.title: Chongryon Officials Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group
articles.content:
Chongryon Officials Condemn Lee Myung Bak Group
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Pak Tong Ho, chairman of the Central Standing Committee of the Korean Students Union in Japan, made public a statement on Monday in denunciation of the Lee Myung Bak group of traitors who slandered and insulted the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 The statement recalled that traitor Lee hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, not content with creating a touch-and-go situation on the Korean Peninsula in collusion with the U.S. imperialists at a time when all the Korean people and overseas compatriots are still grieving over the loss of the great sun of the nation.
					
					 Such hideous provocation perpetrated by the south Korean traitors and military warmongers brought into bolder relief again their true colors as human scum standing against the nation and reunification, it said, adding:
					
					 To hurt the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK amounts to slandering and insulting all the Korean people and progressives of the world.
					
					 We will never pardon traitor Lee and military warmongers for bringing the dark clouds of war to hang over the Korean peninsula and hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					
					 We will strive to build a reunified, independent and peaceful country, rallied close around the dear respected Kim Jong Un in one mind.
					
					 Ho Yong Ho, secretary general of the Central Standing Management Board of the Korean Youth Commercial Association in Japan, released a statement on the same day in support of the statement of the spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army.
					
					 On March 6, chairmen of the Tokyo Metropolitan and Hokkaido, Osaka, Kyoto, Hyogo, Fukuoka, Kanagawa, Ibaragi, Aichi and Hiroshima prefectural headquarters of the General Association of Korean Residents in Japan in their statements accused the Lee group of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.

articles.title: Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Bangladeshi Paper
articles.content:
Kim Jong Il's Work Posted on Website of Bangladeshi Paper
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The full text of leader Kim Jong Il's work "On the Juche Idea" was posted on the website of the Bangladeshi paper Blits on March 4.
					 The work, published on March 31, Juche 71 (1982), deals with the undying historic contributions made by President Kim Il Sung who founded the Juche idea and their significance, the founding of the Juche idea and its philosophical principle, socio-historic principles, guiding principles and historic significance.
					
					 Also posted on the website was a photo of Kim Il Sung and Kim Jong Il standing together on Mt. Paektu.

articles.title: Korean Books Donated to Germany
articles.content:
Korean Books Donated to Germany
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Korean books were donated to Germany on the occasion of the birth anniversary of President Kim Il Sung.
					 A donating ceremony took place at the Thuringen State Committee of the Communist Party of Germany on March 2.
					
					 His works were handed over to the chairman of the committee.
					
					 The chairman of the committee said that the people in the state are reading the President's works with increasing avidity.
					
					 He stressed the need to positively organize seminars on the President's ideas, theories and revolutionary feats and post them on Internet homepages in the future.
					
					 He expressed belief that the Korean people would dynamically advance for the victory of the revolutionary cause of Juche under the leadership of the dear respected Kim Jong Un.

articles.title: Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by British Organizations
articles.content:
Statement of KPA Supreme Command Supported by British Organizations
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- British organizations issued statements in support of the statement of a spokesman for the Supreme Command of the Korean People's Army (KPA).
					 The British Association for the Study of Songun Policy and the British Group for the Study of the Juche Idea in a joint statement on March 2 said that they fully support the stand of the DPRK clarified in the statement of a spokesman for the KPA Supreme Command.
					
					 Intolerable are the acts of the south Korean puppet group hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, the joint statement noted.
					
					 It is natural for the army and the people of the DPRK to punish the south Korean puppet group with arms, it pointed out.
					
					 The south Korean puppet regime is a cancer-like entity in the way of the reunification of Korea, it said.
					
					 The British Branch of the Korean Friendship Association in a statement on March 4 denounced the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime for driving the situation on the Korean Peninsula to the brink of war.
					
					 The south Korean regime is the puppet one formed by the U.S. imperialists at gunpoint long ago and the one plagued with irregularities and corruptions which depends on foreign forces, the statement said.
					
					 It fully supported the unshakable determination and will of the army and people of the DPRK to settle accounts with the Lee Myung Bak puppet regime to the last and defend the socialist country of Juche.
					
					 The peace on the Korean Peninsula is possible only when the group of traitors is removed and the U.S. forces are withdrawn from south Korea, it added.

articles.title: S. Korean Authorities Hit for Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership: Japanese
articles.content:
S. Korean Authorities Hit for Dignity of DPRK Supreme Leadership: Japanese
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Fumihiro Himori, chairman of the Japan Committee for Supporting the Independent and Peaceful Reunification of Korea, issued a statement on March 5 to denounce the south Korean puppet regime for hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK.
					 In the statement he said that the acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are being openly committed at units of the south Korean puppet army at a time when the tense situation is prevailing on the Korean Peninsula owing to the U.S.-south Korea joint military exercises.
					
					 The joint military exercises going against peace and the acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK can never be pardoned, he noted, and went on:
					
					 Voices demanding a stop to the joint military exercises and condemning the acts of hurting the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK are loudly heard not only in the DPRK but south Korean society. This is directly linked with the movement for the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea through the implementation of the June 15 North-South Joint Declaration.
					
					 We support the independent and peaceful reunification of Korea and bitterly denounce the Lee Myung Bak regime for its anachronistic moves for igniting a war and its foolish acts of impairing the dignity of the supreme leadership of the DPRK, out of the stand of supporting all the Koreans in the north and the south and abroad aspiring after peace and reunification.

articles.title: S. Koreas' Moves to Hold "Nuclear Security Summit" under Fire: Nigerian
articles.content:
S. Koreas' Moves to Hold "Nuclear Security Summit" under Fire: Nigerian
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- M. M. Alhassan, chairman of the Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea, released a statement on March 2 to denounce the south Korean authorities for trying to hold the "nuclear security summit".
					 He said:
					
					 The south Korean authorities are busy preparing the "nuclear security summit" in Seoul.
					
					 It does not stand to reason for south Korea to host a meeting for discussing the issue of nuclear security, the nuclear advance base and the largest nuclear powder magazine in the world.
					
					 It is surprising that the U.S. and south Korea are talking about "nuclear security" while giving off the nuclear smell by staging the large-scale joint military exercises from Feb. 27 with huge latest nuclear war equipment involved despite the concern and denunciation by the public opinion inside and outside Korea.
					
					 The Nigerian National Committee for the Study of the Juche Idea is strongly opposed to the moves of south Korea to hold the "nuclear security summit", considering them as a grave insult to the aspiration and desire of the peace-loving people the world over for the peace and security in the Korean Peninsula and the rest of the world.

articles.title: Iranian MP warns Israel
articles.content:
Iranian MP warns Israel
 Tehran, March 8 (KCNA) -- A member of the Iranian Parliament warned Israel it would face retaliation if the Islamic Republic comes under attack.
					 Alaeddin Boroujerdi, chairman of the country's National Security and Foreign Policy Committee, told the state-run Iranian television network Press TV Tuesday any attack on Iran "will be equal to a very serious security threat to the Zionist regime."

articles.title: Brazil's GDP Up 2.7 Pct in 2011
articles.content:
Brazil's GDP Up 2.7 Pct in 2011
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Brazil's GDP reached 4.143 trillion reais (2.367 trillion U.S. dollars) in 2011, up 2.7 percent from 2010, the official IBGE statistics agency said Tuesday.
					 Finance Minister Guido Mantega said several stimulus measures are being taken and "our aim is a growth rate of 4.5 percent" this year.

articles.title: Bird Flu Virus of H5N1 Type Found in Hong Kong
articles.content:
Bird Flu Virus of H5N1 Type Found in Hong Kong
 Beijing, March 8 (KCNA) -- Two dead birds were positive to bird flu virus of H5N1 type in a preliminary examination in Hong Kong on March 6.
					 The place where the birds were found was being cleaned and sterilized thoroughly.

articles.title: 2 Dead in US High School Shooting
articles.content:
2 Dead in US High School Shooting
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Two people, both believed to be adults, were dead in a high school shooting Tuesday in the U.S. state of Florida, media reported.
					The shooting occurred at Episcopal High School in Jacksonville, Florida, according to the Florida Times-Union.
					
					 The incident appeared to be murder-suicide, with one of two dead believed to have been the shooter, according to the report.

articles.title: Britain's Petrol Prices Hit New High
articles.content:
Britain's Petrol Prices Hit New High
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- Petrol prices in Britain have hit a record high on Monday, according to official data released on Tuesday.
					 The British Department of Energy and Climate Change (DECC) said the average price of unleaded petrol in Britain reached 137.3 pence per liter on Monday, 1.1p higher than the week before.

articles.title: UN Mission in Afghanistan Demands Punishment for Quran Burner
articles.content:
UN Mission in Afghanistan Demands Punishment for Quran Burner
 Pyongyang, March 9 (KCNA) -- The top United Nations envoy to Afghanistan on Thursday called on the international military forces in the country to take disciplinary action against those who burned Quran in a U.S. military base in Afghanistan. 
					 Jan Kubis, special representative for the UN secretary-general in Afghanistan, in a press conference called the incident a "big mistake".

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Cho
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad de defensa de isla Cho
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, inspecciono la unidad de defensa de la isla Cho que defiende el puesto avanzado de la costa del Mar Oeste de Corea. 
					El Comandante Supremo obsequio como recuerdo a la unidad binoculos y el fusil automatico y se fotografio junto con los militares. 
					
					Al ver a los familiares de oficiales quienes le vitoreaban en las afueras del cuartel, les llamo cerca y tomo la foto de recuerdo con ellos.
					
					Guiado por los comandantes, el recorrio la sala de educacion en los objetos de interes historico- revolucionario y la sala de presentacion del historial, donde presenciando en detalles los preciosos datos alusivos a las proezas de direccion del Dirigente Kim Jong Il recordo con emocion la gloriosa trayectoria de la unidad de defensa de la isla Cho convertida en una fortaleza inexpugnable bajo la gran atencion del Dirigente.
					
					La isla Cho es la puerta del Mar Oeste y detras de esta se encuentra Pyongyang, dijo el Comandante Supremo y anadio que los militares de la unidad deben defender con mas firmeza los puestos de combate guardando siempre las instrucciones del Dirigente.
					
					El subio al puesto avanzado de mando ubicado en la cima, donde recibio el parte de la situacion desde el jefe de defensa y se entero minuciosamente de los objetos topograficos y el estado de ubicacion de las fuerzas viendo la primera linea de defensa de la unidad.
					
					Pregunto en detalles las fuerzas enemigas que puedan infiltrarse en la zona operacional de la unidad y sus equipos, las tacticas de operacion y el deber de combate de la unidad para aniquilar a los enemigos en la zona cercana al frente y la densidad de fuego y aclaro fehacientemente los asuntos que se presentan en la preparacion de batalla mirando con atencion el mapa de operacion.
					
					Senalo que la isla Cho es el lugar donde no se retire ni un paso atras y anadio que los militares deben dar acicate a la preparacion de combate y aniquilar sin piedad a los invasores si atacan.
					
					El se fotografio junto a los militares de la compania adscrita a la unidad ante el monumento a la orientacion sobre el terreno del Dirigente erguido en el puesto avanzado de mando.
					
					El mismo dia, el Comandante Supremo recorrio la Casa de Militares, la biblioteca y el comedor prestando gran atencion a la vida de los militares del puesto de la isla.
					
					Los militares de la unidad de defensa viven en la desfavorable isla apartada mucho de la tierra, pero son los verdaderos patriotas que dedican todo lo suyo solo por la seguridad de la patria y el pueblo, destaco y agrego que los comandantes deben atender con el sentimiento paternal la vida de ellos.
					
					Al terminar la inspeccion, el dijo a los comandantes que les encarga la isla Cho y les solicito que obtengan con buena salud mayores exitos en la culminacion de la preparacion de combate.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Won Hong, Pak Jae Gyong y Kim Yong Chol, los coroneles generales del EPC Jo Kyong Chol y Yun Tong Hyon, asi como Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y Hwang Pyong So, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 123 de fuerzas navales del EPC
articles.content:
Kim Jong Un inspecciona unidad 123 de fuerzas navales del EPC
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- Kim Jong Un, Comandante Supremo del Ejercito Popular de Corea y Maximo Dirigente del Partido del Trabajo de Corea y el pueblo coreano, inspecciono la unidad 123 de las Fuerzas Navales del EPC con el titulo de Septimo Regimiento de O Jung Hup.
					Al ir hacia la unidad a bordo del cazasubmarinos 202 desafiando los vientos y marejadas, el Comandante Supremo se entero del estado de armamentos del buque y de preparativos de combate de los marinos.
					
					Se mostro muy satisfecho de que todos los oficiales y marinos del buque se hayan formado como invencibles filas de combate capaces de defender con firmeza el mar de la patria haciendo bien los preparativos del combate.
					
					Guiado por los comandantes, el recorrio las salas de educacion en reliquias historicas de la revolucion y de presentacion del historial.
					
					Al ver con atencion los datos historicos de los grandes Hombres sin pares del monte Paektu exhibidos en la primera sala, dijo que brillaran eternamente en los anales de la patria las inmortales hazanas del Presidente Kim Il Sung y el Dirigente Kim Jong Il quienes dedicaron todos sus esfuerzos al desarrollo de las fuerzas navales.
					
					El presto atencion a la brillante trayectoria de combate de la unidad bajo la guia del Presidente y el Dirigente.
					
					Como muestra la historia de combates en el Mar Oeste que asombraron el mundo, es muy bueno el estado ideo-espiritual de nuestros marinos, senalo y destaco que ellos son los valiosos tesoros del partido y la revolucion quienes dedican sin vacilacion la juventud y la vida para defender la patria y el pueblo.
					
					Dando vueltas por la Casa de Militares, la biblioteca, el centro de servicio para militares, el deposito de alimentos subsidiarios, el lugar de elaboracion y otros lugares, hizo conocimiento detallado del estado de la educacion politico-ideologica y de la vida de los marineros.
					
					Preguntando el estado de uso de la Casa de Militares, ordeno a los funcionarios acompanantes a hacer que el Coro Estatal Benemerito ofrezca en esta unidad su primera funcion de gira por las unidades del EPC.
					
					Cerciorandose detalladamente en la biblioteca de la capacidad de libros coleccionados, la suministracion de los libros de lectura obligatoria y ambiente de lectura de los marineros, senalo que debe prestar primordial atencion a la educacion ideologica.
					
					Preguntando otra vez del estado de cultivo de soya que presta mucha atencion en el camino de la inspeccion del frente, se entero de si suministran normalmente a los marineros la soya y aconsejo a los cocineros que trabajen mucho para ellos.
					
					Tomo una foto de recuerdo con los marineros de la unidad.
					
					Respondiendo con la mano alzada a  las efusivas aclamaciones de los marineros fue al puerto militar para partir.
					
					Recorrio el buque Heroe Chae Jong Bo atracado alli.
					
					En el puesto de mando del buque respondio durante largo tiempo a las aclamaciones de los marineros agitando la mano.
					
					En el puerto militar, el Comandante Supremo se fotografio junto con los marineros del cazasubmarinos 202.
					
					Le acompanaron el vicemariscal del EPC Ri Yong Ho, jefe del Estado Mayor General del EPC, el vicemariscal del EPC Kim Yong Chun, ministro de las Fuerzas Armadas Populares, los generales de ejercito del EPC Kim Won Hong, Pak Jae Gyong y Kim Yong Chol, los coroneles generales del EPC Jo Kyong Chol y Yun Tong Hyon, Jang Song Thaek, miembro suplente del Buro Politico del CC del PTC y vicepresidente del Comite de Defensa Nacional, Pak To Chun, miembro suplente del Buro Politico y secretario del CC del PTC, Ri Jae Il, primer subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC y Hwang Pyong So, subjefe de departamento del CC del PTC.

articles.title: CRPP critica actitud mas desafiante de banda de traidor Lee Myung Bak
articles.content:
CRPP critica actitud mas desafiante de banda de traidor Lee Myung Bak
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- El portavoz del Comite por la Reunificacion Pacifica de la Patria (CRPP) publico el dia 9 una declaracion en relacion con que la banda del traidor surcoreano Lee Myung Bak actua mas provocativamente, lejos de pedir de rodillas las disculpas ante los militares y civiles de la Republica Popular Democratica de Corea indignados por sus tremendos crimenes barbaros. 
					La nota va como sigue: 
					
					El pasado dia 5, el portavoz del Ministerio de Defensa Nacional del Sur de Corea dijo que "no vale la pena de responder a cada paso a la persistencia del Norte", "los carteles en una unidad de Inchon son para establecer la concepcion del enemigo" y "tenemos que urgir al Norte el cese de calumnias". 
					
					Los tipejos del Ministerio de Reunificacion tambien sueltan disparates como "proyecto ideado en el interior del ejercito", "una cosa inadecuada" y "es razonable cesar inmediatamente las calumnias al Sur" con el fin de evadir la responsabilidad de su tremendo crimen. 
					
					Lo mas grave del caso es que los gangsteres de la capa militar surcoreana dice que "no retiraremos los retratos y las consignas de censura colocados en las unidades militares" y que "desarrollaremos como previsto los ejercicios militares sin hacer caso de la persistencia del Norte". 
					
					El ministro de Defensa Nacional, Kim Kwan Jin, autor de la presente provocacion nunca vista, aparecio en la isla Yonphyong, donde dijo que "el Norte provocaria indudablemente" y ordeno a "responder de modo rotundo y fuerte con el sentimiento de venganza por el caso de hundimiento de la corbeta 'Cheonan' y el de canonazos en la isla Yonphyong". 
					
					Esto es un grave desafio que aumenta la indignacion de los militares y civiles de la RPDC levantados en la sagrada guerra de venganza y otra provocacion imprudente de la horda de traidores ignorantes del poderio real del ejercito revolucionario del monte Paektu. 
					
					El proceder de la banda de traidores que habla de la "represalia" y "venganza" con la decision de no quitar los carteles insultantes a la maxima dignidad de la RPDC significa la declaracion de guerra.
					
					El hecho muestra claramente que mientras existe la banda de traidores, gangsteres no vistas, la nacion coreana no puede vivir ni un dia en paz ni desaparecera en la Peninsula Coreana el peligro de la guerra. 
					
					No se acepta la palabra para la horda de traidores que intenta extender la confrontacion fratricida al mar de fuego. 
					
					Puesto que la banda de traidores cometio la provocacion abierta, el ejercito y pueblo de la RPDC pondran de pleno manifiesto su voluntad de aniquilar despiadadamente a los enemigos y traera la reunificacion de la patria. 
					
					Esto es la decision final de nuestro ejercito y pueblo.

articles.title: Es inevitable el arruinamiento del imperialismo yanqui, Rodong Sinmun
articles.content:
Es inevitable el arruinamiento del imperialismo yanqui, Rodong Sinmun
Pyongyang, 9 de marzo (ACNC) -- El diario Rodong Sinmun divulgo este viernes un articulo individual destacando que ya paso el tiempo en que Estados Unidos imponia su ley en la ONU y se va acabando la epoca de "unica superpotencia" del mundo. 
					En el escenario politico mundial, no se aceptan el despotismo y arbitrariedades de EE.UU., precisa el diario y prosigue:
					
					La posicion de EE.UU. en la ONU se ha debilitado tanto que tuvo que sentarse hasta en el banquillo de acusados por sus actos violatorios de derechos humanos.
					
					Como producto de la injusta politica economica, la economia norteamericana entro en decadencia y EE.UU. se convirtio en el deudor mas grande del mundo. 
					
					Para implementar su estrategia de dominar el mundo, viene produciendo y desplegando en masas nuevos armamentos invirtiendo enormes gastos militares. 
					
					En particular, desembolso colosales fondos al desarrollo y produccion de nuevas armas nucleares, debido a lo cual se incrementa con creces el deficit presupuestario. 
					
					Por otra parte, se debilita la posicion hegemonica del dolar norteamericano en el circulo financiero internacional y se deteriora la superioridad militar de EE.UU. en la arena internacional. 
					
					A citar un ejemplo, EE.UU. sigue sufriendo muchas bajas en la "guerra antiterrorista" aunque moviliza en ella a muchos efectivos que hacen alarde de la "supremacia" mundial y hasta las armas de exterminio masivo hechas a base de exitos cientifico-tecnicos de punta. 
					
					Todos los hechos muestran que el imperialismo norteamericano vivio ya su tiempo y le queda unicamente el arruinamiento final. 
					
					Los imperialistas encabezados por EE.UU. no podran salvar su destino, que se apaga, pese a sus desesperados esfuerzos. 
					
					Es inevitable el arruinamiento del imperialismo norteamericano.
